Term semantic definition: A unique identification of the Invoice.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 売り手が発番した請求書を識別する番号または文字列。売り手が発番した、請求書を一意に識別する番号。

Term semantic definition: The date when the Invoice was issued.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 請求書の発行日付、または請求書の書面上の発行日付。

Term semantic definition: The time of day when an invoice was issued
Term semantic definition in local langua: 請求書の発行時刻。

Term semantic definition: A code specifying the functional type of the Invoice.
Term semantic definition in local langua: この文書のタイプを識別するコード。請求書の機能を特定するためのコード。

Term semantic definition: The currency in which all Invoice amounts are given, except for the Total TAX amount in accounting currency.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 請求書に記載された通貨を表すコード。会計通貨での請求書消費税合計金額を除き、請求書に記載されている全て金額の表示の通貨コード。

Business term name in local language: 税会計報告用通貨コード
Term semantic definition: The currency used for TAX accounting and reporting purposes as accepted or required in the country of the Seller.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 会計報告や財務報告に使用する通貨を表すコード。売り手の国で認められたもしくは要求された会計報告や財務報告に使用する通貨を表すコード。

Term semantic definition: The date when the TAX becomes accountable for the Seller and for the Buyer in so far as that date can be determined and differs from the date of issue of the invoice, according to the TAX directive.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 請求書の日付とは異なる日付が、商取引の課税対象とされる基準日。税法に基づき、請求書発行日付とは異なる日付で、売り手、買い手が税を記帳する場合の、その日付。

Term semantic definition: The code of the date when the TAX becomes accountable for the Seller and for the Buyer.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 売り手、買い手が税を記帳する日付が何であるかを示すコード。

Term semantic definition: The date when the payment is due.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 支払条件で示された支払期日。

Term semantic definition: An identifier assigned by the Buyer used for internal routing purposes.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 買い手によって割り当てられたIDで、買い手の内部ルーティングの目的で使用。買い手が付したIDで、買い手内部での後続処理目的で使用。

Term semantic definition: The identification of the project the invoice refers to
Term semantic definition in local langua: 発注品に関するプロジェクト・工事案件等を管理するための番号。インボイスが参照するプロジェクトのID。

Term semantic definition: The identification of a contract.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 参照する契約書に記載の文書番号。

Term semantic definition: An identifier of a referenced purchase order, issued by the Buyer.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 買い手が発行した購買発注を参照する場合の当該購買発注に記載の文書番号。

Term semantic definition: An identifier of a referenced sales order issued by the Seller.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 売り手が発行した受注を参照する場合の当該受注に記載の文書番号。

Business term name in local language: 受取通知書(検収書)参照
Term semantic definition: An identifier of a referenced receiving advice.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 参照する受取通知書（検収書）に売り手が付番した番号。

Business term name in local language: 出荷案内書(納品書)参照
Term semantic definition: An identifier of a referenced despatch advice.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 参照する出荷案内書（納品書）に売り手が付番した番号。

Term semantic definition: The identification of the call for tender or lot the invoice relates to.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 参照する入札またはロットの番号。

Business term name in local language: 請求されるオブジェクトID
Term semantic definition: An identifier for an object on which the invoice is based, given by the Seller.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 請求書の根拠となるIDで、売り手が指定。請求書の根拠となるオブジェクトのIDで、売り手が指定したもの。

Business term name: The identification scheme identifier of the Invoiced object identifier.
Business term name in local language: 請求されるオブジェクトIDのスキーマID
Term semantic definition: If it may be not clear for the receiver what scheme is used for the identifier, a conditional scheme identifier should be used that shall be chosen from the UNTDID 1153 code list [6] entries.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 受信者にとって、IDにどのスキーマが使用されているかが明確でない場合は、UNTDID1153コードリストから選択される条件付きスキーマIDを使用する必要がある。

Term semantic definition: A textual value that specifies where to book the relevant data into the Buyer's financial accounts.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 買い手の財務勘定科目に関連データを記帳する場所を指定する。買い手のどの勘定に関連データを記帳すべきかを指定するためのテキスト値。

Term semantic definition: Information about the terms that apply to the settlement of the invoice amount.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 請求額の決済に適用される条件に関する情報。

Term semantic definition: A textual description of the payment terms that apply to the amount due for payment (Including description of possible penalties).
Term semantic definition in local langua: 支払額に適用される支払条件の説明(罰則の記載を含む)。支払条件の文字による説明。

Term semantic definition: The payment instructions that apply to these payment terms.
Term semantic definition in local langua: これらの支払条件を適用する支払指示。

Term semantic definition: The payment amount that these terms apply to.
Term semantic definition in local langua: これらの条件が適用される支払金額。

Term semantic definition: The date before end of which the terms amount shall be settled.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 分割支払の場合の各支払期日。

Term semantic definition: A group of business terms providing textual notes that are relevant for the invoice, together with an indication of the note subject.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 請求書についての注釈。

Business term name in local language: - 請求書注釈表題コード
Term semantic definition: The subject of the textual note in EN BT-22.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 注釈の表題。

Term semantic definition: A textual note that gives unstructured information that is relevant to the Invoice as a whole.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 注釈の内容を入力するフリースペース。

Business term name in local language: プロセスコントロール
Term semantic definition: A group of business terms providing information on the business process and rules applicable to the Invoice document.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 取引プロセスに関する情報。請求書に適用するビジネスプロセス及びルールについての情報。

Business term name in local language: - ビジネスプロセスタイプ
Term semantic definition: Identifies the business process context in which the transaction appears, to enable the Buyer to process the Invoice in an appropriate way.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 取引プロセスの名称。買い手が適切な方法で請求書を処理することができるように、取引が行われたビジネスプロセスを識別する。

Term semantic definition: An identification of the specification containing the total set of rules regarding semantic content, cardinalities and business rules to which the data contained in the instance document conforms.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 取引プロセスのID。セマンティックコンテンツ、カーディナリティや、インスタンス文書に含まれているデータが準拠すべきビジネスルールに関するルール一式を含む、仕様を識別する。

Term semantic definition: A group of business terms providing information on one or more preceding Invoices.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 1つ以上の先行請求書に関する情報。

Term semantic definition: The identification of an Invoice that was previously sent by the Seller.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 売り手が以前に送付した請求書番号。

Term semantic definition: The date when the Preceding Invoice was issued.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 先行請求書の発行日。

Term semantic definition: A group of business terms providing information about the Seller.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 売り手に係る情報。

Term semantic definition: The full formal name by which the Seller is registered in the national registry of legal entities or as a Taxable person or otherwise trades as a person or persons.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 売り手を表す名称。売り手を表す法的に正式な名称。

Term semantic definition: A name by which the Seller is known, other than Seller name (also known as Business name).
Term semantic definition in local langua: 売り手名称以外で、知られているビジネス上の名称。

Term semantic definition: An identification of the Seller.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 売り手を表すID。

Term semantic definition: If used, the identification scheme identifier shall be chosen from the entries of the list published by the ISO/IEC 6523 maintenance agency.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 使用する場合、スキーマIDは、ISO / IEC6523 の保守機関によって公開されたリストから選択しなければならない。

Term semantic definition: An identifier issued by an official registrar that identifies the Seller as a legal entity or person.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 売り手を表す法的企業ID。

Term semantic definition: If used, the identification scheme shall be chosen from the entries of the list published by the ISO/IEC 6523 maintenance agency.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 使用する場合、識別スキーマは、ISO / IEC6523 の保守機関によって公開されたリストから選択しなければならない。

Term semantic definition: The Seller's TAX identifier (also known as Seller TAX identification number).
Term semantic definition in local langua: 売り手の税ID番号。日本の場合は、適格請求書発行事業者登録番号T+法人番号（国税庁）。

Term semantic definition: The local identification (defined by the Seller's address) of the Seller for tax purposes or a reference that enables the Seller to state his registered tax status.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 売り手住所により決まるローカルの売り手ID。 売り手が登録済みであることを示すための税登録ID。

Term semantic definition: Additional legal information relevant for the Seller.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 売り手に関する追加の法的情報。

Term semantic definition: Identifies the Seller's electronic address to which the application level response to the invoice may be delivered.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 請求書に対するアプリケーションレベルの応答が配信される売り手の電子アドレスを識別する。

Term semantic definition: The scheme identifier shall be chosen from a list to be maintained by the Connecting Europe Facility.
Term semantic definition in local langua: スキーマIDは、Connecting Europe Facility (CEF) が管理するリストから選択しなければならない。

Term semantic definition: A group of business terms providing information about the address of the Seller.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 売り手の住所に関する情報。

Term semantic definition: The main address line in an address.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 売り手の住所欄1。

Term semantic definition: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 売り手の住所欄2。

Term semantic definition: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 売り手の住所欄3。

Business term name in local language: - - 売り手住所 市区町村
Term semantic definition: The common name of the city, town or village, where the Seller address is located.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 売り手住所 市区町村。

Term semantic definition: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant postal service.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 売り手の郵便番号。

Business term name in local language: - - 売り手住所 都道府県
Term semantic definition: The subdivision of a country.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 売り手住所の地方区分。日本の場合は、都道府県。

Term semantic definition: A code that identifies the country.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 売り手の国コード。

Term semantic definition: A group of business terms providing contact information about the Seller.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 売り手の連絡先に係る情報。

Term semantic definition: A contact point for a legal entity or person.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 売り手の連絡先の個人の、文字で表現された名前（部門名を含む）。

Business term name in local language: - - 売り手連絡先電話番号
Term semantic definition: A phone number for the contact point.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 売り手の連絡先電話番号。

Business term name in local language: - - 売り手連絡先電子メールアドレス
Term semantic definition: An e-mail address for the contact point.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 売り手の連絡先電子メールアドレス。

Term semantic definition: A group of business terms providing information about the Buyer.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 買い手に係る情報。

Term semantic definition: The full name of the Buyer.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 買い手の名称。

Term semantic definition: A name by which the Buyer is known, other than Buyer name (also known as Business name).
Term semantic definition in local langua: 買い手名称以外で、知られているビジネス上の名称。

Term semantic definition: An identifier of the Buyer.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 買い手を表すID。

Term semantic definition: If used, the identification scheme shall be chosen from the entries of the list published by the ISO/IEC 6523 maintenance agency.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 使用する場合、識別スキーマは、ISO / IEC6523 の保守機関によって公開されたリストから選択しなければならない。

Term semantic definition: An identifier issued by an official registrar that identifies the Buyer as a legal entity or person.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 買い手を表す法的企業ID。

Term semantic definition: If used, the identification scheme shall be chosen from the entries of the list published by the ISO/IEC 6523 maintenance agency.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 使用する場合、識別スキーマは、ISO / IEC6523 の保守機関によって公開されたリストから選択しなければならない。

Term semantic definition: The Buyer's TAX identifier (also known as Buyer TAX identification number).
Term semantic definition in local langua: 買い手の税ID番号。日本の場合は、適格請求書発行事業者登録番号。

Term semantic definition: Identifies the Buyer's electronic address to which the invoice is delivered.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 請求書の送信先となる買い手の電子アドレスを識別する。

Term semantic definition: The scheme identifier shall be chosen from a list to be maintained by the Connecting Europe Facility.
Term semantic definition in local langua: スキーマIDは、Connecting Europe Facility (CEF) が管理するリストから選択しなければならない。

Term semantic definition: A group of business terms providing information about the postal address for the Buyer.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 買い手の住所に関する情報。

Term semantic definition: The main address line in an address.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 買い手の住所欄1。

Term semantic definition: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 買い手の住所欄2。

Term semantic definition: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 買い手の住所欄3。

Business term name in local language: - - 買い手住所 市区町村
Term semantic definition: The common name of the city, town or village, where the Buyer's address is located.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 買い手住所 市区町村。

Term semantic definition: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant postal service.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 買い手の郵便番号。

Term semantic definition: The subdivision of a country.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 買い手住所の地方区分。日本の場合は、都道府県。

Term semantic definition: A code that identifies the country.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 買い手の国コード。

Term semantic definition: A group of business terms providing contact information relevant for the Buyer.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 買い手の連絡先に係る情報。

Term semantic definition: A contact point for a legal entity or person.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 買い手の連絡先。

Business term name in local language: - - 買い手連絡先電話番号
Term semantic definition: A phone number for the contact point.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 買い手の連絡先電話番号。

Business term name in local language: - - 買い手連絡先電子メールアドレス
Term semantic definition: An e-mail address for the contact point.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 買い手の連絡先電子メールアドレス。

Term semantic definition: A group of business terms providing information about the Payee, i.e. the role that receives the payment.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 支払先に係る情報。

Term semantic definition: The name of the Payee.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 支払先の名称。

Term semantic definition: An identifier for the Payee.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 支払先のID。

Term semantic definition: If used, the identification scheme shall be chosen from the entries of the list published by the ISO/IEC 6523 maintenance agency.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 使用する場合、識別スキーマは、ISO / IEC6523 の保守機関によって公開されたリストから選択しなければならない。

Term semantic definition: An identifier issued by an official registrar that identifies the Payee as a legal entity or person.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 支払先の国際企業ID。

Term semantic definition: If used, the identification scheme shall be chosen from the entries of the list published by the ISO/IEC 6523 maintenance agency.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 使用する場合、識別スキーマは、ISO / IEC6523 の保守機関によって公開されたリストから選択しなければならない。

Term semantic definition: A group of business terms providing information about the Seller's tax representative.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 売り手の納税管理人に係る情報。

Business term name in local language: - 売り手納税管理人名称
Term semantic definition: The full name of the Seller's tax representative party.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 売り手の納税管理人名称。

Term semantic definition: The TAX identifier of the Seller's tax representative party.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 売り手の納税管理人の税ID。日本の場合は、納税管理人の適格請求書発行事業者登録番号(T+法人番号(国税庁))。

Business term name in local language: - 売り手納税管理人住所
Term semantic definition: A group of business terms providing information about the postal address for the tax representative party.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 納税管理人の住所に関する情報。

Term semantic definition: The main address line in an address.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 納税管理人住所欄1。

Term semantic definition: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 納税管理人住所欄2。

Term semantic definition: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 納税管理人住所欄3。

Business term name in local language: - - 納税管理人住所 市区町村
Term semantic definition: The common name of the city, town or village, where the tax representative address is located.

Term semantic definition: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant postal service.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 納税管理人郵便番号。

Term semantic definition: The subdivision of a country.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 納税管理人住所の地方区分。日本の場合は、都道府県。

Term semantic definition: A code that identifies the country.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 納税管理人国コード。

Term semantic definition: A group of business terms providing information about where and when the goods and services invoiced are delivered.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 納入先に係る情報。

Term semantic definition: The name of the party to which the goods and services are delivered.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 納入先の名称。

Term semantic definition: An identifier for the location at which the goods and services are delivered.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 納入先の場所ID。

Term semantic definition: If used, the identification scheme shall be chosen from the entries of the list published by the ISO/IEC 6523 maintenance agency.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 使用する場合、識別スキーマは、ISO/IEC 6523 の保守機関によって公開されたリストから選択しなければならない。

Term semantic definition: the date on which the supply of goods or services was made or completed.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 実際の納入日。

Term semantic definition: A group of business terms providing information on the invoice period.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 請求期間に関わる情報。

Term semantic definition: The date when the Invoice period starts.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 請求期間開始日。

Term semantic definition: The date when the Invoice period ends.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 請求期間終了日。

Term semantic definition: A group of business terms providing information about the address to which goods and services invoiced were or are delivered.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 請求される財/サービスの納入先の住所に関する情報

Term semantic definition: The main address line in an address.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 納入先の住所欄1。

Term semantic definition: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 納入先の住所欄2。

Term semantic definition: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 納入先の住所欄3。

Business term name in local language: - - 納入先住所 市区町村

Term semantic definition: The identifier for an addressable group of properties according to the relevant postal service.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 納入先の郵便番号。

Business term name in local language: - - 納入先住所 都道府県
Term semantic definition: The subdivision of a country.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 納入先住所の地方区分。日本の場合は、都道府県。

Term semantic definition: A code that identifies the country.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 納入先の国コード。

Term semantic definition: A group of business terms providing information about the payment.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 取引条件のうち支払に関する情報。

Term semantic definition: An identifier for the payment instructions.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 各支払指示に対して割り当てられるID。

Business term name in local language: - 支払手段タイプコード
Term semantic definition: The means, expressed as code, for how a payment is expected to be or has been settled.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 取引決済手段のタイプを識別するコード。

Term semantic definition: The means, expressed as text, for how a payment is expected to be or has been settled.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 取引決済手段を説明するテキスト。

Term semantic definition: A textual value used for payment routing or to establish a link between the payment and the Invoice.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 支払と請求書とを紐づけるために使用されるテキスト。

Term semantic definition: The identification of the identification scheme. As example ABA
Term semantic definition in local langua: スキーマID、例えば、ABA。

Term semantic definition: A group of business terms to specify credit transfer payments.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 銀行振込による支払を指定。

Term semantic definition: A unique identifier of the financial payment account, at a payment service provider, to which payment should be made.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 支払先となる、金融機関の口座ID。IBAN(SEPA支払いの場合)など。

Term semantic definition: The identification of the identification scheme. As example IBAN
Term semantic definition in local langua: スキーマID、例えば、IBAN。

Term semantic definition: The name of the payment account, at a payment service provider, to which payment should be made.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 支払先口座の口座名義人名。

Term semantic definition: An identifier for the payment service provider where a payment account is located.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 支払先口座がある金融機関ID。

Term semantic definition: The address of the financial institution or its branch that holds the payment account.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 金融機関やその支店の住所。

Term semantic definition: The main address line in an address.

Term semantic definition: An additional address line in an address that can be used to give further details supplementing the main line.

Term semantic definition: The unit of measure that applies to the Item price base quantity.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 品目単価基準数量に適用される単位。

Term semantic definition: A group of business terms providing information about the TAX applicable for the goods and services invoiced on the Invoice line.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 請求書明細行で請求される財、サービスに適用される消費税に係る情報。

Business term name in local language: - - 請求される品目に対する課税分類コード
Term semantic definition: The TAX category code for the invoiced item.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 請求される品目に対して適用される課税分類コード。

Business term name in local language: - - 請求される品目に対する税率
Term semantic definition: The TAX rate, represented as percentage that applies to the invoiced item.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 請求される品目に対して適用される税率で、パーセントで表現。

Term semantic definition: A textual statement of the reason why the line amount is exempted from TAX or why no TAX is being charged
Term semantic definition in local langua: 非課税または課税されない理由をコードで表現。

Term semantic definition: A coded statement of the reason for why the line amount is exempted from TAX.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 非課税または課税されない理由をテキストで表現。

Term semantic definition: A TAX amount that applied to each item unit.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 品目単位に適用される消費税額。

Term semantic definition: A code indicating the type of tax
Term semantic definition in local langua: 税の種類を示すコード。

Term semantic definition: A group of business terms providing information about the goods and services invoiced.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 請求される財、サービスに係る情報。

Term semantic definition: A name for an item.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 取引品目の品名。

Term semantic definition: A description for an item.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 取引品目を説明した文章。

Term semantic definition: An identifier, assigned by the Seller, for the item.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 売り手が取引品目に割当てたID

Term semantic definition: An identifier, assigned by the Buyer, for the item.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 買い手が取引品目に割当てたID

Term semantic definition: An item identifier based on a registered scheme.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 登録されているスキーマに基づいた品目ID。

Term semantic definition: The identification scheme shall be identified from the entries of the list published by the ISO/IEC 6523 maintenance agency.
Term semantic definition in local langua: ISO/IEC 6523 で公開されているエントリの一覧から選択した、品目標準IDのスキーマID。

Term semantic definition: A code for classifying the item by its type or nature.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 種類や性質によって品目を分類するコード。

Term semantic definition: The identification scheme shall be chosen from the entries in UNTDID 7143 [6].
Term semantic definition in local langua: 品目分類IDの識別スキーマID。

Business term name in local language: - - - スキーマのバージョンID
Term semantic definition in local langua: スキーマのバージョン。

Term semantic definition: The code identifying the country from which the item originates.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 品目の原産国を識別するコード。

Term semantic definition: A group of business terms providing information about properties of the goods and services invoiced.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 品目およびサービスのプロパティに関する情報

Term semantic definition: The name of the attribute or property of the item.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 品目の属性またはプロパティの名称。

Term semantic definition: The value of the attribute or property of the item.
Term semantic definition in local langua: 品目の属性またはプロパティの値。
